# blastshield_groups (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield groups with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `idp_externalid` (List of String) Filter by idp_externalid.
- `idp_provisioned` (Boolean) Filter by idp_provisioned.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.

### Read-Only

- `groups` (Attributes List) List of groups matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups))

<a id="nestedatt--groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups`

Read-Only:

- `endpoints` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups--endpoints))
- `id` (Number)
- `idp_externalid` (String)
- `idp_provisioned` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
- `tags` (Map of String)
- `users` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--groups--users))

<a id="nestedatt--groups--endpoints"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups.endpoints`

Read-Only:

- `expires` (Number)
- `id` (Number)


<a id="nestedatt--groups--users"></a>
### Nested Schema for `groups.users`

Read-Only:

- `expires` (Number)
- `id` (String)
